article.headline: Iona 77, Northern Arizona 67
article.story: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) -- Steve Burtt scored 19 points and Iona used a 15-0 run in the second half to rally past Northern Arizona 77-67 Monday night in the first round of the Guardians Classic. The Gaels fell behind by as many as 10 points early in the second half but they turned things around in a hurry to build a 52-45 lead with 9:15 to play. The 15-point run in a span of 2:36 was highlighted by three 3-point plays inside, two by Greg Jenkins. Ricky Soliver added 17 points, Jenkins scored 11 and Kiril Wachsmann added 10 for the Gaels, who built their lead over the turnover-prone Lumberjacks to 63-51 with less than six minutes to play. NAU (0-1) had 25 turnovers, 15 of them in the second half. Kelly Golob led the Lumberjacks with 16 points while Kyle Feuerbach had 12 and Ruben Boykin Jr. 11. The Lumberjacks hit five of their eight 3-pointers in the first half, two each by Golob and Feuerbach, who finished with four from beyond the arc. The tournament, held in Omaha's Qwest Center, features 12 teams from 12 conferences.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
